title: BRIEF-Phinma Corp Says Unit Signs Agreement For Acquisition Of Port Facilities For 800 Mln Pesos
text:
BRIEF-Phinma Corp Says Unit Signs Agreement For Acquisition Of Port Facilities For 800 Mln Pesos

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 11:30)

BRIEF-Phinma Corp Says Unit Signs Agreement For Acquisition Of Port Facilities For 800 Mln Pesos Sept 27 (Reuters) - PHINMA Corp :

* UNIT SIGNED AGREEMENT FOR ACQUISITION OF PORT FACILITIES

AND

LAND FOR ITS BATAAN CEMENT PROCESSING TERMINAL FOR PHP 800

MILLION

* CEMENT PROCESSING TERMINAL AND ITS PORT FACILITIES

EXPECTED TO

BE FUNCTIONAL BY Q4 2019 & WILL BE USED EXCLUSIVELY BY UNIT



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX4vW8yp

Further company coverage: PHN.PS





BRIEF-Phinma Corp Says Unit Signs Agreement For Acquisition Of Port Facilities For 800 Mln Pesos
